document_data.name: ''Kristalight''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite polyhedron/105/The Living City: Misti's Moonlight Pawnshop|18}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Kristalight''''' was an [[enchanted]] piece of crystal created sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description:
''Kristalight'' was a mostly clear {{SI|1'0|'"|long=yes}}-long and {{SI|0'1|'"|long=yes}}-wide chunk of an elongated hexagonal crystal, seeming of natural origin.

It was a fragile item. A fall from a height of {{SI|3'0|'"|long=yes}} was sure to shatter ''Kristalight,'' and it could not be fixed apart from via a powerful casting of the ''[[mend]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.Powers: When the item's [[command word]]s, "Orthala, Orthala, magic crystal, give light," were uttered, the item began emitting strong strobing light in the area of {{SI|6'0|'"|long=yes}} in diameter. To stop, the user had to say "Orthala, Orthala, make the light cease."
document_data.History: ''Kristalight'' was one of the more unique items available from the [[Misti's Moonlight Pawnshop]] in the Living City, [[Raven's Bluff]], run by [[Misti Morgan]], a proprietor of the establishment and a [[thief]], in the late 14{{th}} century DR.
